com.att.aro.main

Class CommandLineHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.aro.main.CommandLineHandler

  • public class CommandLineHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class that handle all command line arguments passed in the ARO analyzer. This class may be modified or extended to allow for the addition of custom data structures and methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected CommandLineHandler()
      Protected constructor allows for extensions
